question:
Consider the following statements:
1. Hindu Painters Basawan and Daswant were the chief painters in the court of Mughal emperor Akbar
2. Bishandas was painter at the court of the Mughal emperor Jahangir
3. Manohar Das was a painter in the court of both Akbar and Jahangir
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: Hindu Painters Basawan and Daswant were the chief painters in the court of Mughal emperor Akbar. Bishandas was painter at the court of the Mughal emperor Jahangir. Manohar Das was a painter in the court of both Akbar and Jahangir. All the above are correct.
